column5: http://www.nitro.com/boat/index.cfm?boat=2681  What do they sell these for up north?

$24,397.  If you scroll down the left side of the link you provided, they have a spot you can convert over to the CND. price for comparison...that's for my postal code, but I am fairly certain the price is the same across the board.  Sweet looking boat!  Good Fishing,  Justin
Thanks Justin! Dollar dropping in value and they still want more for them up there? LOL go loonie!
Using this morning's rate, there would be a $600 difference.
'08 NITRO Z-6 w/Mercyry 115 optimax $20,995 cdn  "08 NITRO Z-9 CDC with     mercury 225 optimax $50,395 cdn  this are special prices till Jan. 20/08 at Bass pro  Vaughan
Actually Justin the price is not the same across the board, oddly enough??? List price for Toronto  is $23 095  at BPS and couple other dealers.
Hmmm, good to know, Lostchild. Strange, as I believed all Tracker Boats (Nitro) had "no-hassle" set pricing.. Thanks for pointing it out.  Justin
Oppps!!! I took another look and was looking at the red price not the final price in black your right same price $24 397. My bad!!!
Yeah, the red price fooled me at first - guess it's there for a reason!  Good Fishing, Justin
difference is probably freight, customs brokerage fees and duties?  It is crossing the border after all
